synopsis.text: Or phaned misfits and a billionaire visionary unite to defend Earth against a technologically advanced alien menace in the year 2041. The Zeravire, a new enemy, emerges in the solar system, annihilating military installations and threatening humanity's existence. Anticipating this invasion, wealthy philanthropist Klein Sandman assembles a team of young pilots to control Gravion, a colossal robot harnessing the power of gravity. Among these pilots are Eiji, a determined youth in search of his missing sister, and Toga, a fellow recruit. Together with four other individuals, they must put aside their differences and master Gravion to stand against the Zeravire onslaught and safeguard the future of mankind.
